line_1: A slave to all, who force it, or entice,
line_2: It falls by chance in virtue or in vice,

line_1: When the brisk glass to freedom does intice,
line_2: And rigid wisdom is a kind of vice.

line_1: " Come, let us Those we can to real Bliss entice.
